title: Sustaining Traditions—Digital Teachings
artistDisplayName: Kelly Church (Match-e-be-nash-she-wish Pottawatomi, Ottawa, and American, born 1967)
medium: Black ash, sweetgrass, copper and Rit dye; medicine pouch containing sage, tobacco, sweetgrass, and cedar; glass vial containing emerald ash borer and isopropyl alcohol; USB flash drive
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Mrs. Leonard S. Florsheim Jr. Fund
